text: The Crying Game is a 1992 British Japanese Irish romantic thriller movie directed by Neil Jordan and starring Stephen Rea, Forest Whitaker, Miranda Richardson, Jaye Davidson, Adrian Dunbar, Tony Slattery, Jim Broadbent, Birdy Sweeney, Ralph Brown. It was distributed by Miramax Films and was nominated for 6 Oscars and won an Academy Award for Neil Jordan in 1993. ==Other websites== * Category:1992 romance movies Category:1992 thriller movies Category:1992 LGBT movies Category:British romance movies Category:British thriller movies Category:British LGBT movies Category:Japanese romance movies Category:Japanese thriller movies Category:Japanese LGBT movies Category:Irish LGBT movies Category:Irish romance movies Category:Irish thriller movies Category:Movies directed by Neil Jordan Category:Movies set in London Category:Movies set in Northern Ireland Category:Movies about the Irish Republican Army Category:Movies about interracial romance Category:Transgender in movies Category:Miramax movies
title: The Crying Game
